page.title: 05Home Life - Bartley Green
page.content: In our area most people live in semi- detached houses. Most are made of concrete & brick. The windows in these houses are large with wooden or metal frames & an opening for fresh air. Many houses have central heating & gardens. People with a lot of money may have swings & slides for their children in the garden. Inside the house there is furniture to sit on, to eat at and to store food in. We have many electrical gadgets to wash & dry our clothes, wash the dishes, prepare & cook food, to store and keep food fresh for a long time. These gadgets enable people in the home to have more leisure time. Many of the floors are covered by thick wool carpets except in the working areas e.g. kitchen. Most toys are made from plastic & metal. Some have electrical parts. Many houses have TV, computers, videos & music-centres.
